Summary Note:
The RM was introduced to Ortega Suárez Herrera at a corporate retreat in Madrid. They participated in team-building activities and developed a strong rapport, which eventually led to a successful business partnership.
Having worked for over 20 years, Ortega Suárez Herrera brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
Family Background: Ortega Suárez Herrera has been happily married to Valeria since 2015. Their child is  named Dácil.
Education Background:
Ortega completed his secondary education at Instituto de Bachillerato Artístico IES Reina Sofia Tenerife in 2001.
Ortega finished his studies at Ramón Llull University in 2006.
Occupation History:
Ortega Suárez Herrera is a 43 year old Construction Company Owner from Spain.
Ortega Suárez Herrera launched his career as a Property Manager at Merlin Properties SOCIMI S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2005 to 2010.
In 2011, he moved to Realia Business S.A. to work as a Developer, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
His tenure as a Construction Company Owner at Realia Business S.A. from 2017 till now was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 170000 EUR.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Santa Cruz de Tenerife and Madrid, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He inherited a significant sum of 440000 EUR from his grandfather, a respected Tech Entrepreneur, in 2006, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Ortega as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
